about_the_game:
《Geometry Raid》is a rogue-lite space slash shooter game, the game combines classic barrage shooting and sword slash game elements. By driving a two-part ship,you can shoot and swing tail to crush the enemy . The game focuses on hardcore physics simulation and maximizing the melee slash experience.

Features

Hardcore 2D sword melee slash simulation and the multiple genres built around it

Hardcore physics collision simulation: The movement of players, enemies, and bullets is simulated by the Godot physics engine to create a realistic sense of impact

Hardcore damage calculation: Inspired by the damage system of riding and slashing, which I incorporated into my game, in-game damage is determined by factors such as quality and relative speed. This means that the faster the relative velocity between objects, the higher the damage caused

Geometry Madness is a game in continuous development, and I will be updating it constantly to expand the depth and content of the game.
